meanings.definition: A written or printed version of material originally presented in another medium.
meanings.sent1: I needed a transcript of the speech to study it carefully.
meanings.sent2: The librarian handed me a transcript of the audio recording.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a mysterious transcript in the old book.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a transcript, capturing every detail of the scene.
meanings.sent5: The transcript was so detailed, it felt like I was there when it happened.

meanings.definition: An official record of a student's grades and courses taken at a school or college.
meanings.sent1: She requested her high school transcript for college applications.
meanings.sent2: The university requires a transcript for admission.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally spilled ink on the student's transcript.
meanings.sent4: His transcript was a roadmap of his academic journey.
meanings.sent5: The transcript revealed her hard work and dedication throughout the years.
